summary: Update to "Real Flying (with Gliding and Collisions)" by Anton, with Mutagen Potions from all 9 wings options.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][u]Description:[/u]
[/b][/size]
This is a update made for the Mod: "Real Flying (with Gliding and Collisions)" by Anton.
99,9% of the credits for it Belongs to him.
What I made is just the tedious work of creating via CK the recipes for the Wing Variations Anton created himself.

All of the scripting, glitches, etc, will be exactly the same from the "Original Real Flying".

[size=4][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size]

- Added all the 9 Existing recipes from "Real Flying - Dragon Wing Variations" to be made at the Cooking Pot;
- All recipes are more or less difficult to be made. Some by Bravery, others by patience, to provide a feeling of progression. (Call me a masochist, but I don't like the idea of Flying even before you can buy a horse);
- "Real Flying - Scripts Update 01" was already applied in the Zip File;

[u][b][size=4]Requirements:
[/size][/b][/u]
SKSE and FNIS (and Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package for Visual Studio 2013 (x86)) - Same as Real Flying

[u][b][size=4]Installation:
[/size][/b][/u]
- First, REMOVE the original "Real Flying" files. Some files will be replaced, and others (like textures and meshes) I had to rename. So, do it!
- Unpack archive to the game's folder and activate mod in launcher.
- Run "Generate FNIS for Users.exe" and press "Update" button.
- Cook the "Mutagen" in any cooking pot, then drink it.

[size=4][u][b]Known issues:[/b][/u][/size]

- The same inherited from Real Flying;
- If you drink two different Mutagen Potions, and then "Cure" them, your jump height will be the same as when you had the wings, and it will be fixed only after restarting the game;

[size=4][u][b]Credits:
[/b][/u][/size]
All credits toÂ Anton0028: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/437824/?
[b]The mind behind it, and thanks for authorizing me to distribute this update![/b]
author: InertRen

files.name: Real Flying - Diversity
files.changelogHtml:
Added Missing "Danger Wings" Mutagen that was missing
Added a "Invisible Wings" extra Mutagen, so you fly and use other sorts of equipped Wings
